definition: (of light or other electromagnetic radiation) having only one wavelength
details:
adjective
- (of light or other electromagnetic radiation) having only one wavelength
= example: (of light or other electromagnetic radiation) having only one wavelength
= synonyms: homochromatic
- having or appearing to have only one color
= synonyms: monochrome, monochromic, monochromous
- of or relating to monochromatism
